message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $130.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to counteroffer at $120.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can do $125. It's the lowest I can go.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'd like to counteroffer at $120 if possible.
I understand you're still interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm fairly compensated. I'm thinking $127.50. It's the best I can do.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I'd like to counteroffer at $125 if possible.
I'm trying to find a mutually beneficial price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $126. It's a fair price, considering the value you've placed on the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'd like to counteroffer at $125 if possible.
I'm starting to think we're close, Bob. I'm willing to make one final concession. I can do $128, but that's as low as I can go. It's the minimum I need to make a profit.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I believe we can agree on $125 for the product.
